      • changeExp

        public void changeExp(int amt)
        Adjust the player's XP by the given amount in an intelligent fashion. Works around some of the non-intuitive behaviour of the basic Bukkit player.giveExp() method.
        Parameters:
        amt - Amount of XP, may be negative

      • changeExp

        public void changeExp(double amt)
        Adjust the player's XP by the given amount in an intelligent fashion. Works around some of the non-intuitive behaviour of the basic Bukkit player.giveExp() method.
        Parameters:
        amt - Amount of XP, may be negative

        public int getLevelForExp(int exp)

      • getXpNeededToLevelUp

        public int getXpNeededToLevelUp(int level)
        Retrieves the amount of experience the experience bar can hold at the given level.
        Parameters:
        level - the level to check
        Returns:
        the amount of experience at this level in the level bar
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the level is less than 0

      • getXpForLevel

        public int getXpForLevel(int level)
        Return the total XP needed to be the given level.
        Parameters:
        level - The level to check for.
        Returns:
        The amount of XP needed for the level.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the level is less than 0 or greater than the current hard maximum
